header.title: Projects & Articles
header.subtitle: A collection of key projects and thought leadership pieces demonstrating practical applications of AI and automation strategy.

githubHeader.title: Featured GitHub Projects
githubHeader.subtitle: A selection of open source projects and experiments.

items.title: Case Study: The Making of This Website
items.description: A deep dive into the architecture, technology, and development process behind this portfolio, built with React, TypeScript, and the Gemini API.

items.title: NoteTaker AI: Intelligent Note-Taking & Knowledge Management
items.description: A privacy-first, offline-capable, intelligent workspace that uses generative AI to transcribe, summarize, and organize your notes.

items.title: Interactive Showcase: Gemini Rush
items.description: A rebranded, polished, playable showcase testing the instant binary decision-making of the Gemini 2.5 Flash AI in real-time.

items.title: Component Library Showcase
items.description: A live demonstration of new, reusable components added to the website's dynamic page builder, including new hero styles and interactive cards.

items.title: The Ultimate AI Assistant Playbook
items.description: A strategic framework for designing and building effective AI assistants, from simple FAQ bots to proactive, enterprise-grade co-pilots.

items.title: Playbook: The AI Onboarding Assistant
items.description: A deep-dive, step-by-step guide on building an enterprise-grade onboarding solution using Copilot Studio and Power Automate.

items.title: AI Ethics Strategy for Insurance
items.description: A strategic project analyzing the ethical implications of AI in insurance, delivering a roadmap for fair and unbiased automation in claims processing and underwriting using responsible AI principles.

items.title: AI Hackathon: Winning Insurance Assistant
items.description: A hackathon-winning proof-of-concept for a Generative AI assistant, built on Google Cloud Platform with Vertex AI, designed to help insurance agents find complex policy information instantly.

items.title: Project Deskmate: AI ServiceNow Agent
items.description: A proof-of-concept demonstrating how a Generative AI agent can diagnose user issues, create detailed tickets, and slash resolution times in ServiceNow.

items.title: AI Dungeon Explorer: The Great Escape
items.description: An interactive game showcasing Gemini's ability to solve complex, multi-step puzzles requiring strategic reasoning and planning.

items.title: AI-Powered Document Summarizer
items.description: A tool using Generative AI to summarize long technical documents, reports, and articles, showcasing advanced NLP capabilities.

items.title: Automated Customer Feedback Analysis
items.description: A system using Azure AI Language to analyze sentiment, extract key topics, and categorize customer feedback from various channels.

githubProjects.description: A proof-of-concept demonstrating how a Generative AI agent can diagnose user issues and create detailed tickets in ServiceNow.
A privacy-first, offline-capable, intelligent workspace that uses generative AI to transcribe, summarize, and organize your notes.
